## SynQLiteOptionsBase.sqlite3 property

A BetterSqlite3 instance.

**Signature:**

```typescript
sqlite3?: BetterSqlite3Instance;
```

## Remarks

If not provided, [SynQLiteOptionsBase.filePath](./synqlite-node.synqliteoptionsbase.filepath.md) must be set.
